content: update your seasonal space with this rich crochet blanket pattern is worked in rounds in one piece from the center out with a striped pattern that s easy to follow practice single_crochet and chain slip_stitch techniques the unique texture of bernat lattice combined with the crochet moss stitch adds softness to the fabric select preferred shades to create the mood you want in your home materials bernat® lattice™ 7 8 oz/220 g 389 yds/356 m main color mc golden hour 19008 1 ball contrast a rust mix 19007 1 ball contrast b cream 19013 1 ball contrast c teal mix 19010 1 ball measurements approx 56 x 58 142 x 147 cm
